website_summaries.verdict: Aside from being comfortable and flexible, the Soft 8 Tie by Ecco has a sleek and clean look which is perfect for a casual getup. Built with a thicker outsole, many attest that these kicks can withstand wear and tear even with everyday walking and traveling.These shoes do have some drawbacks, but most are focused on the short and brittle laces except for the complaints about the very thick sidewalls and poor cushioning.
pros: The Ecco Soft 8 Tie, according to many testers, is a versatile sneaker
Many also share that this sneaker is very durable
Most users say this shoe fits true to size
Several commenters like the ECCO Comfort Fibre System as it aids air circulation inside the shoe
A good majority of the reviewers find the sole of the Soft 8 Tie lightweight and flexible
Many buyers report how pleased they were with the maximum support it provides for the foot
Some users recommend this product to their peers
cons: A few people complain about the lacing which easily breaks after regular use
Some customers are not pleased with the Ecco Soft 8 Tie’s short laces that are hard to tie
A few purchasers are disappointed with its poor cushioning

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but I prefer the Soft 7.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the Soft 7 at the same time to compare. The Soft 7's were cheaper (on sale) and I actually prefer them over the 8's. The 7's feel noticeably more cushioned on the feet and more comfortable overall. The reason I'm still giving these 4 stars despite that is because they're still comfortable, nice shoes. I just happen to prefer the 7's after a side-by-side comparison. Also, while I liked the polished and very minimal look of these in pictures, in person this actually results in them being very boring looking on the foot, so that's another reason I prefer the 7's. However, these can be dressed up while the 7's can't.
customer_reviews.author: rcarnero

customer_reviews.title: Great Product But...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I tried on this model in Tokyo, in a soft olive green leather that was much pricier. The leather in this blue shoe is slightly stiffer, dressier and the price was much more appealing. I bought a pair of cognac Soft 7’s last year that I enjoy very much. I just noticed today when wearing them for the first time that the tip of one of the shoelaces is defective; see enclosed photo. I will take this up with the seller. If the seller will send me a replacement pair of round blue laces that match these shoes I will give this product 5 stars. I have had no luck with ECCO where shoelaces are concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A.

customer_reviews.title: After 4 days of use, the right sneaker began ...
customer_reviews.text: After 4 days of use, the right sneaker began to be unstuck on both sides of the welt. It's scary to imagine what will happen in a couple of months. I bought shoes for the autumn season to walk in the rain, apparently it does not work ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good, but not as comfortable as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish for work or casual. However not the most comfortable Eccos. I switched to wearing nothing but Ecco after decades of cheap shoes. Unlike all my other Ecco shoes these required some time to break in. After standing for about 8 hours they start to hurt my feet. In comparison, my Ecco dress shoes I could wear all day and night right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: AKE

customer_reviews.title: These Kicks are dope
customer_reviews.text: The real leather is buttery soft, the build is solid, the support is good, the color is hyperneutral to fit literally any outfit, the fit is perfect, and the overall aesthetic is on point. I sleep with these shoes on. Just me, a pair of boxer briefs, my blankey, and these fire replacements for my old Nike SB Team Classics in cream. This color is called "Gravel" and is a perfectly acceptable neutral for cream. 10/10 I hope they have a big enough stock for me to buy a few more pair. The Soft Tie 8's are ECCO's top of the line for the fashion forward streetwear outfit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ecco sneakers. The quality of these shoes is amazing and certainly justifies paying $120 for a pair of sneakers. Ecco's have good arch support and a wide toe box. The back of the ankle in these low top sneakers has a slight lip to hold your heel in place for a tight fit in the back. The leather upper is pretty nice, although its a bit squeaky at first. Took a few days to get the squeak out. I also love the look of these particular sneakers. The brown leather and black rubber makes it look slightly dressier than a casual sneaker in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory I.

customer_reviews.title: Universal shoe with Lots of Comfort and Style
customer_reviews.text: The fit? great! The comfort level? AWESOME!! and they are good enough for all day wear right out of the box. The style? it's a 10 out of 10. This color looks amazing with just about everything in my wardrobe from jeans to dress pants. It's definitely on the casual side, but it still looks good to dress down a pair of dress pants yet nice enough to dress up a pair of shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Look Great and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are just what I expected when I ordered. And the price for this brand is great. They are a little narrow but I wear a 2E or 4E normally. These come in a medium width. Still they are comfortable. And they come with a foam insert. I put them on a stretcher overnight and they are perfect. Eccos tend to be wider than most other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Roger X

customer_reviews.title: Points for style but not the best experience overall
customer_reviews.text: These ECCO's look great but are not the most comfortable shoes I've owned from the company. I normally where Size 45 and they are a bit snug. In addition, one shoestring broke on the second wear. Shoestring on the second shoe broke about 2 weeks later. No problem ... I ordered replacements (different brand) on Amazon.com and the shoes are back in service.
customer_reviews.author: Rick R

customer_reviews.title: Size, Quality
customer_reviews.text: Haveing them only 3 days, Looks great, feels fantastic... but Just be aware of size, runs bit larger, weather, after a mild walk in moderate wet day they changed color, picture is shot next morning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are actually a light olive green
customer_reviews.text: These shoes don't match the color in the stock photo. The first photo that I took of these shoes, was in low light, without the flash, and it actually matched the stock photo, so I can totally understand why this happened. Outside of that, they look great. They feel great. I like Ecco. I'm keeping the shoes. They are really nice. I would definitely recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Al Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Better Press that "Add To Cart" Button - Now
customer_reviews.text: Place your order because these shoes are dope especially the Lion/Black color I purchased. For the sizing situation, I normally wear a size US 9 pr 9.5, so I purchased the EU 42 which works fine. I've worn them with mostly jeans but pairing them with some nice chinos will get you some compliments as well.
customer_reviews.author: James Lofton

customer_reviews.title: If the shoe fits where it!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Ecco shoes for many years. The sizing has been consistent. They are very comfortable and look great. I always look for Ecco shoes first when I need a comfort shoe. The have never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe comfortable and stylish, I recieved a lot of positive compliments form both men and women. I wouldn't have it as my only go to pair of casual shoe since the white trim scruff very easily so with constant wear you will be doing a lot of scrubbing to keep it white. It does make for an excellent addition to a shoe collection for variety and comfort(yes I said comfort again they are really comfortable to me).
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Runs big.
customer_reviews.text: I have several soft 7s and a pair of soft 8, this pair of soft 8 felt larger than my other pair, and the sole even felt a bit different, not as comfortable. I love the black on black, but it just didn’t work out for me. I returned them and bought my self a different pair of eccos. Eccos rarely disappoint, this pair was one of those rare pairs that did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are just so comfortable. That's all I can really say. They look just like you'd expect - understated, classy and good to wear to the office. But mostly, they're just so comfortable I want to wear them 5 days a week. Lightweight, soft leather, springy soles and zero break-in time.
customer_reviews.author: thedishesaredoneman

customer_reviews.title: Color is accurate.  Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I love Ecco shoes. I have several pair and finally got these in a sweet dark blue. Now if it will just stop raining, I can wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Among the most comfortable shoes I have. If you want this casual look in a shoe that is well made choose these. I have tried others and so far these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: B Curry

customer_reviews.title: Not for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking sneakers, with a hard-to-find darker sole. Sadly, the arch is too high for me. Probably great for those with high arches, but for those with flatter feet, these just don't work. I returned them - and am still on the lookout for a great looking brown sneaker with darker soles.
customer_reviews.author: HeightsGuy

customer_reviews.title: Love style but not size
customer_reviews.text: Shoes feel comfortable but not true size, came with sticker size logo. But shoe is larger size then ordered. Please ecco if you can't provide accurate shoes size don't advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Bonly

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have a pair of casual Ecco Shoes to walk the dogs in the grass when the weather is too cold for sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Yaffe

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: The style is very beautiful, the leather is soft and the shoes are light. Is the size is too big, usually wear 44 yards 28cm shoes, this pair of ecco44 yards, insole more than 29cm. The size of the ecco shoes can't be controlled.
customer_reviews.author: chuanxiao

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ecco shoes, and the worst. Although the leather is supple to the touch, the toe box does not bend smoothly. This leaves my big toe irritated.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: It's actually the same shoe I spent ~$180 dollars on a few years ago
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this not expecting much. However, to my surprise, this shoe is exactly the same as the one I bought a few years back. From what I've heard, Ecco discontinued this due to a lack of demand. I'm glad I can still find this shoe on Amazon, and I'll be bummed when the supply gets all bought up.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pretty true 12 and this was somewhat large. I wore a thicker sock and all was well. very comfortable but flat. my other shoes have more heel so that was an adjustment. Plan to buy another color.
customer_reviews.author: H. madden

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My second pair, nothing compares to this shoe, comfortable stylish all around foot wear
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Randall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌 product from excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller, fast Transaction, smoothly deal, high quality product, good price, same as described, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ahmed hussein

customer_reviews.title: They seem like very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: They seem like very nice shoes, but I don't see how anyone could fit their foot in these things. I feel like one of Cinderell'a step sisters. I tried a 45 and a 46, and they were both some of the tightest feeling shoes I've ever tried on. I think they were long enough, just very narrow/cramped. So if you have sticks for feet, these might be a good fit!
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Other than the arch support, which needs improving... it fits as expected and is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Great design, beutiful shoes. I will be coming back for review.
customer_reviews.author: Soares da Cunha

customer_reviews.title: These shoes might feel a half size larger in your size.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these shoes. I waited months for my size to become available. My size never became available, so I ordered the next half size down. They are a perfect fit. It was meant to be. I currently have 2 pair, and I'm considering the temptation of buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Al Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good wear
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable to try on, just the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe purchase I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe, I now have 3 pairs in various colors. Love this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Baqi S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe that is decently comfy, but I do wish it was a bit more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Eye whoke that the laces go thru already tore. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great for going to casual restaurants and clubhouse after playing golf.Makes me feel like Fred Couples👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: edward gusman

customer_reviews.title: The sizes are a little bit larger than normal sizes level.
customer_reviews.text: It gives very soft texture and comfort feeling. Strongly recommend to you!
customer_reviews.author: Seoulite

customer_reviews.title: A little bit large compared to some ECCO shoes I ...
customer_reviews.text: A little bit large compared to some ECCO shoes I have in the same size but wear a heavier socks that solve the problem to me.
customer_reviews.author: Manny N.

customer_reviews.title: The quality justyfies the brand name!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are really comfortable to wear, however white rubber hard to keep always clean...
customer_reviews.author: Parna

customer_reviews.title: Very UNCOMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: If you looking for a sneaker comfortable, DON'T BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Aylin GL

customer_reviews.title: At first I was like wow too much in the price but when I ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was like wow too much in the price but when I bought it and wore to work people where commending the shoe, It goes with all out fit, I would always recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Ozy

customer_reviews.title: Used shoe
customer_reviews.text: It was used . I paid for new. The box was ripped. Shoe was not wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: WILFREDO A ANARNA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! This shoes are great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! This shoes are great, very confortable and extremely well designed. Delevery was super fast. Amazon and DHL kept me informed at all time. I’m very satisfied in general.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel de Castro

customer_reviews.title: ECCO is a great brand and makes a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I own other ECCO shoes and this pair is of good quality and fit. I highly recommended this produce.
customer_reviews.author: Edward B VanVoorhees

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: As always excellent quality and fits good. All my shoes by Ecco right now. Thanks for ecco
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: prefer Soft 7 to Soft 8
customer_reviews.text: Much prefer the 7 to the 8, but both have ECCO comfort as one would expect. Shoelaces didn't hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike46

customer_reviews.title: Ecco, great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable. A little bit of heel slippage but can be fixed with the right tightening. Overall impressed
customer_reviews.author: Seth Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! Great look and feel. Definitely recommend these Ecco Soft 8 Sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes but shoes aged quick. But overall its nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Thacher

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe and a real eye catcher in blue !
customer_reviews.author: daboyv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but like others have mention, the white band is very difficult to keep white.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: WTF,The received item does not correspond to the photo on the website。
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes ran large on my foot so I returned them and got a size smaller and they are great
customer_reviews.author: john c.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little big and the plant is not at soft as expected
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Canales

customer_reviews.title: amzing
customer_reviews.text: this shoes fits very well,and it's very comfortable,i like that
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The best shoe. Quality of an Ecco and style of the most recent fashion at a discounted Amazon price. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: do they offer inserts to make them tighter? thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Soft 8 Tie Sneaker
product_meta.description: Modern thick cup-sole style sneakers combined with soft, supple unstructured leather uppers highlight the premium materials and Scandinavian design while the ECCO fluid form™ technology provides anatomical support and long lasting durability.
feature_bullets: Long-lace sneaker in special re-tanned leather for an even pebbled structure to complement a contemporary look
Full leather-lining offers a sophisticated look and feel, while promoting a comfortable wearing experience
Anatomically-moulded, inlay sole with ECCCO Comfort Fiber System (ECFS) is leather covered and helps to keep footwear fresh and dry; Extra-width option with insoles removed
Direct-injected, two component pu/tpu outsole- light and flexible with a unique, youthful design trending a heavier cupsole
